pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to Teaching Materials from a ZIP File or GitHub // Teaching materials, e.g. R programs, Shiny apps, data and PDF/HTML documents, which are stored on the Internet in a ZIP file (e.g. as a GitHub repository) can be downloaded. They can be displayed or run locally. The content of the ZIP file is temporarily (or permanently) stored. The GitHub repository 'sigbertklinke/mmstat4.data' is used as the default repository. In addition, some auxiliary functions are implemented.
